mapper.select: select t.technician_id, t.first_name, t.last_name, t.phone_number, t.email, m.maintenance_id, m.date_start, m.date_end, m.description, m.bike_id from technicians t left join maintenance m on t.technician_id = m.technician_id where t.technician_id = #{id}

select t.technician_id, t.first_name, t.last_name, t.phone_number, t.email, m.maintenance_id, m.date_start, m.date_end, m.description, m.bike_id, m.technician_id from technicians t left join maintenance m on t.technician_id = m.technician_id
mapper.insert: insert into technicians (first_name, last_name, phone_number, email) values (#{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email});
mapper.update: update technicians set first_name = #{firstName}, last_name = #{lastName}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, email = #{email} where technician_id = #{technicianId}
